sections.heading: of guilty; record; accused; custody
sections.text: If the accused pleads guilty the plea shall be recorded on the indictment, and the accused may be placed in the custody of the sheriff until sentence.SourceG.S.1873, c. 58, § 452, p. 823;R.S.1913, § 9096;C.S.1922, § 10121;C.S.1929, § 29-1819;R.S.1943, § 29-1820;La
